inputs.name: dicm2nii_folder
inputs.description: Path to folder containing dicm2nii.m file.

inputs.name: dcmsource
inputs.description: Source file or folder: can be a zip or tgz file, a folder containing dicom files, or other convertible files. It can also contain wildcards like 'run1_*' for all files start with 'run1_'.

inputs.name: outfmt
inputs.description: Output file format: '.nii' for single nii uncompressed, '.nii.gz' for single nii compressed (default), '.hdr' for hdr/img pair uncompressed, '.hdr.gz' for hdr/img pair compressed, '.nii 3D' for 3D nii uncompressed (SPM12), '.nii.gz 3D' for 3D nii compressed, '.hdr 3D' for 3D hdr/img pair uncompressed (SPM8), '.hdr.gz 3D' for 3D hdr/img pair compressed, 'bids' for bids data structure (http://bids.neuroimaging.io/).
